comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
The Sterling name rang a bell - the ship 'Helen B Sterling', named after Captain Edward Robert Sterling's wife, had a rather sad ending in Sydney in the 1930s.  See comments etc on this photo of the ship passing under the Harbour Bridge in 1931 - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/2695259558/]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thank you for that link beachcomber! It is a wonderful photograph. There appears to be quite a bit of information about the vessels, and the shipping family available which is promising.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
